summary:
Add large house for many followers.

- Heartfire childrens support.
- Bathroom support.
- Teleport spell tome support.

and more.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/59543-1-1419589989.jpg[/img]

[color=#66ff00][size=4][b] = Simple Edition is new Release ! = [/b][/size][/color]

- Simple Edition
[list][*][size=2]Better performance version.[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]You can choose childrens room.[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]This version is removed some displays, bathroom and pool from version 3.[/size][/*]
[/list]
- 3.21
[list][*][size=2]Fixed misprint.[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Fixed interior lights.[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Added Thalmor banner.[/size][/*]
[/list]

----------
[color=#ff7700][size=4][b] * * Requires ALL DLC * * [/b][/size][/color]
----------

[youtube]m5DjunniEOk[/youtube] [youtube]a6cHthocKJw[/youtube]

[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/59543-1-1419006404.jpg[/img]

[color=#93c47d][size=3][b]- DESCRIPTION -[/b][/size][/color]
[size=2]Add simple large house for followers.[/size]

[color=#ffd966][b]Main Floor[/b][/color]
[list][*][size=2]38 Beds + Master Double Beds + 6 children's Beds[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]24 Weapon racks[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]2 Shield racks[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]90 Book shelves[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Crafting tools[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Shrines[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Doomstone[/size][/*]
[/list]
[color=#ffd966][size=2][b]Master Room[/b][/size][/color]
[list][*][size=2]Master double bed[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]4 Weapon racks[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]20 Book shelves[/size][/*]
[/list]
[color=#ffd966][size=2][b]Cellar[/b][/size][/color]
[list][*][size=2]193 Weapon racks[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]30 Shield racks[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]34 Mannequins[/size][/*]
[/list]
[color=#ffd966][size=2][b]Exterior[/b][/size][/color]
[list][*][size=2]32 Planter soils[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Crafting tools[/size][/*]
[/list]

[color=#93c47d][size=3][b]- INSTALLATION -[/b][/size][/color]
[list][*][size=2]Recommend use [u][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/modmanager/]NMM[/url][/u] or [u][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1334/?]Mod Organizer[/url][/u][/size][/*]
[/list]
[color=#93c47d][size=3][b]- RECOMMENDED MODS -[/b][/size][/color]
[list][*][size=2][u][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59914/?]My Home Is Your Home v2[/url][/u] [color=#b6b6b6]by[/color] Updated by smashly [color=#b6b6b6]-[/color] Original author Volek[/size][/*]
[*][size=2][u][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41304/?]SIZE DOES MATTER - NPCs do not rescale shrink resize - less camera restrictions[/url][/u] [color=#b6b6b6]by[/color] Mahlzeit88[/size][/*]
[/list]
[color=#93c47d][size=3][b]- MORE INFO -[/b][/size][/color]
[list][*][size=2]Supported Hearthfire childrens.[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Supported teleport spell tome[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]You can Fast Travel from inside Lodge.[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Blacksmith Forge can make Skyforge Equipments, and Stalhrim Equipments.[/size][/*]
[/list]
[color=#93c47d][size=3][b]- CHANGE LOG -[/b][/size][/color]
[list][*][size=2]If you want know change log, please check CHANGES page.[/size][/*]
[/list]
[color=#93c47d][size=3][b]- FUTURE PLAN -[/b][/size][/color]
[list][*][size=2][s][color=#b6b6b6]Make room for Hearthfire childrens.[/color][/s] Completed.[/size][/*]
[*][size=2][s][color=#b6b6b6]Make Bathroom.[/color][/s] Completed.[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Something.[/size][/*]
[/list]
-----

[color=#c27ba0][size=3][b]- MODS USED IN SCREENSHOTS -[/b][/size][/color]

[color=#ffd966][size=2][b]Follower[/b][/size][/color]
[list][*][size=2][u][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37861/?]Skyrim Beautiful Followers - SBF[/url][/u] [color=#b6b6b6]by[/color] hrk1025[/size][/*]
[*][size=2][u][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55981/?]MBWS DLC Followers[/url][/u] [color=#b6b6b6]by[/color] Ria[/size][/*]
[*][size=2][u][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37440/?]Colorful Magic[/url][/u] [color=#b6b6b6]by[/color] 184Gesu[/size][/*]
[*][size=2][u][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57861/?]Ronzo in Skyrim[/url][/u] [color=#b6b6b6]by[/color] MJP2008[/size][/*]
[*][size=2][u][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41381/?]Mystic Knight Sara - Standalone Follower[/url][/u] [color=#b6b6b6]by[/color] StandAlone01[/size][/*]
[*][size=2][u][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/47237/?]Nanako Blues - Standalone Follower[/url][/u] [color=#b6b6b6]by[/color] StandAlone01[/size][/*]
[*][size=2][u][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/45862/?]Poet follower[/url][/u] [color=#b6b6b6]by[/color] hangakin[/size][/*]
[*][size=2][u][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37869/?]Chaconne Follower[/url][/u] [color=#b6b6b6]by[/color] rxkx22[/size][/*]
[*][size=2][u][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52853/?]YuiH Standalone Follower - Sha[/url][/u] [color=#b6b6b6]by[/color] YuiH[/size][/*]
[*][size=2][u][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54973/?]TDN Followers - Necromancer Follower - Xavier[/url][/u] [color=#b6b6b6]by[/color] Nightshade[/size][/*]
[*][size=2][u][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59477/?]Follower - Eleonora[/url][/u] [color=#b6b6b6]by[/color] korosukenari[/size][/*]
[/list]
[color=#ffd966][size=2][b]Equipment[/b][/size][/color]
[list][*][size=2][u][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19733/?]Immersive Armors[/url][/u] [color=#b6b6b6]by[/color] Hothtrooper44[/size][/*]
[*][size=2][u][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27644/?]Immersive Weapons[/url][/u] [color=#b6b6b6]by[/color] Hothtrooper44 [color=#b6b6b6]-[/color] Ironman5000 [color=#b6b6b6]-[/color] Eckss[/size][/*]
[*][size=2][u][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37440/?]Colorful Magic[/url][/u] [color=#b6b6b6]by[/color] 184Gesu[/size][/*]
[*][size=2][u][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5727/?]Isilmeriel LOTR Weapons Collection[/url][/u] [color=#b6b6b6]by[/color] Isilmeriel[/size][/*]
[*][size=2][u][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57467/?]DCR - Blade Set Reloaded[/url][/u] [color=#b6b6b6]by[/color] Angilla[/size][/*]
[*][size=2][u][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13665/?]Gizmodian Oblivion Weapons for Skyrim[/url][/u] [color=#b6b6b6]by[/color] Gizmodian[/size][/*]
[*][size=2][u][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57870/?]The Huntsman[/url][/u] [color=#b6b6b6]by[/color] InsanitySorrow[/size][/*]
[*][size=2][u][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58704/?]Faction Crossbows[/url][/u] [color=#b6b6b6]by[/color] Deserter X[/size][/*]
[/list]
[color=#ffd966][size=2][b]Other[/b][/size][/color]
[list][*][size=2][u][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56020/?]AIR ENB[/url][/u] [color=#b6b6b6]by[/color] hrk1025[/size][/*]
[/list]
[color=#c27ba0][size=3][b]- CREDITS -[/b][/size][/color]
[list][*][size=2]Bath Towels and Soap Resource [color=#b6b6b6]by[/color] InsanitySorrow[/size][/*]
[*][size=2][u][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53192/?]Elianora's Extra Resources[/url][/u] [color=#b6b6b6]by[/color] Elianora[/size][/*]
[*][size=2][u][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60492/?]Phitt's Fishtank[/url][/u] [color=#b6b6b6]by[/color] Phitt [color=#b6b6b6]and[/color] Tamira[/size][/*]
[*][size=2][u][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17303/?]Rug Resource[/url][/u] [color=#b6b6b6]by[/color] yourenotsupposedtobeinhere[/size][/*]
[/list]

-----
[size=2]This is my first mod, and my English is not good.[/size]
[size=2]Thanks for reading.[/size]
author: Lanif

files.name: Silverpeak Lodge v1.4
files.changelogHtml:
- Add new respawns version.
Respawn all item in Lodge except all your items and NPCs.
Respawn time is GameSetting: iHoursToRespawnCell (Default: 240h)

- Bug Fixed
Fixed camera bug in room.
Fixed Navmesh in exterior.
Fixed Light in exterior.
Fixed Torch in exterior.

files.name: Silverpeak Lodge v3.0beta
files.changelogHtml:
- Add New
Change bedroom position.
Added bathrooms.
Added displays area.
Added some toggle switch.
Fixed invisible LOD bug.
Fixed interior lights.

files.name: Silverpeak Lodge v3.1
files.changelogHtml:
Added some displays.
Added Akatosh's bless : protect lodge from dragons.
Fixed some objects.

files.name: Silverpeak Lodge v3.2
files.changelogHtml:
Fixed elder scroll display bug.
Fixed exterior lights.
Fixed LOD.

files.name: Silverpeak Lodge - Full Edition
files.changelogHtml:
Fixed misprint.
Fixed interior lights.
Added Thalmor banner.
